inclusion.criterion: voluntarily signed the informed consent form
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: ≥18 years of age on day of signing informed consent form
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: report of recent injecting drug use (within the previous 6 months)
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: eligible for DAA therapy as per the PBS
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: unable or unwilling to provide informed consent or abide by the requirements of the study
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has chronic HCV infection and is on IFN plus RBV combination therapy. He is also on direct antiviral drugs.
